text:
@realDonaldTrump Trump says, "We are winning"

Reported US coronavirus deaths via @CNN:

4 weeks ago: 58 deaths
3 weeks ago: 323 deaths
2 weeks ago: 2,043 deaths
1 week ago: 8,488 deaths
Right now: 20,602 deaths

Is this #winning ? Perhaps I don't understand the meaning of the word then.
